javadoc:
{@link GFileSystem} add-on interface that allows a filesystem publish the fact that
 it supports an import feature allowing the caller to import binaries directly into
 Ghidra without going through a {@link Loader}.

methods.name: getProgram
methods.comment:
NOTE: ONLY OVERRIDE THIS METHOD IF YOU CANNOT PROVIDE AN INPUT STREAM
 TO THE INTERNAL FILES OF THIS FILE SYSTEM!
 
 BE SURE TO REGISTER THE GIVEN CONSUMER ON THE PROGRAM.
 
 Returns a program for the given file.

params.name: file
params.comment: the file to convert into a program

params.name: languageService
params.comment: the language service for locating languages and compiler specifications

params.name: consumer
params.comment: the consumer for the program to be returned

return.comment: a program for the given file

methods.name: canProvideProgram
methods.comment:
Returns true if this GFileSystem can convert the specified GFile instance into
 a Ghidra Program.

return.comment:
boolean true if calls to #getProgram(GFile, LanguageService, TaskMonitor, Object)
 will be able to convert the file into a program.

name: GFileSystemProgramProvider
comment:
GFileSystem add-on interface that allows a filesystem publish the fact that
 it supports an import feature allowing the caller to import binaries directly into
 Ghidra without going through a Loader.
